item.description:
Report X-2024040015

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR NOTICED A HAZMAT THAT SMELLED LIKE RUBBING ALCOHOL THAT CAME DOWN THE IRREG BELT. RESPONDER WAS CALLED WHO PICKED UP PACKAGE AND BROUGHT TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING

item.title: Report X-2024040014
item.description:
Report X-2024040014

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-04T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: CALL WAS MADE TO THE DMP CAGE ABOUT A LEAKING HAZMAAT. DESIGNATED RESPONDER FOUND PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR WET. FOLLOWING ALL RESPONDER METHODS, PACKAGE WAS SECURED AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE TO BE PROCESSED

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal NWN. It was reported that approximately 1 gallon of PPG White Primer was released from one 5-gallon plastic pail due to improper loading by terminal XML. The release impacted trailer #3173809.
